content.description:
Desert alpine conditions.  You have crappy rock, loose rock, and its a long way away from anything.

Fun little route if your traveling and want a beautiful summit and great landscape.  Just enough good rock for protection.  Wear a helmet in case the leader trundles something.

There are only a few 5.5 moves have fun!
content.protection:
single rack to a .5 - 3.5 should do

This should be done in 2 pitches.  Huge belay ledge, but can be done with one.

content.description: Pretty melow climbing, its slightly run out but the climbing is easy. I did all of it in my approach shoes. There was a couple of moves that were maybe 5.6 higher up closer to the top. Watch for loose rock.
content.location: Use the same approach as the Standard Route. Its in the same chimney, instead of going right, to the ledge in the standard route go left straight up to the bolts on top.
